description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Lamb & Beet Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meat pizza,Eggplant,Seafood free,Soy free,Lamb,Mince,Egg free,Easter leftovers,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Spicy Lamb & Beet Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Stir in cumin and paprika. Add mince and cook for 10 minutes, stirring with a wooden spoon to remove lumps. Season.
Meanwhile, preheat a chargrill over high heat. Spray eggplant slices with oil and chargrill for 2 minutes each side or until charred and tender.
To make the tzatziki, halve the cucumber lengthways and remove seeds with a teaspoon. Grate and place into a bowl. Stir in yoghurt and chopped mint. Season.
Spread hummus over cooked pizza bases. Top with mince and eggplant slices. Drizzle with tzatziki and finish with beetroot and mint leaves, to serve.
